list.Description: The School Bus vehicle information supplementary to the vehicle information in ICBC
list.Name: SchoolBus

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a SchoolBus
list.Name: id

list.Description: The registration number of the vehicle as entered by the user and confirmed by the CCW Web Services
list.Name: ICBCRegistrationNumber

list.Description: The License Plate Number for the vehicle
list.Name: licencePlateNumber

list.Description: A code used by the automotive industry to uniquely identify individual motor vehicles. A vehicle identification number is frequently referred to using the acronym VIN and it is occasionally referred to as a chassis number.
list.Name: VehicleIdentificationNumber

list.Description: The (generated) permit number for the School Bus. The number is set by the system when the inspector generates a permit based on a business rule permit number format.
list.Name: permitNumber

list.Description: The date a permit number was established for this School Bus.
list.Name: permitIssueDate

list.Description: Status of the school bus record - current values are Inactive, Active, Archived
list.Name: status

list.Description: True if the School Bus is registered outside of BC.
list.Name: isOutOfProvince

list.Description: The Jurisdication of an Out Of Province Bus. Needed for querying CCW.
list.Name: CCWJurisdiction

list.Description: Address Line 1 of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalAddress1

list.Description: Address Line 2 of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalAddress2

list.Description: City of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalCity

list.Description: Province of physical location of the School Bus - free form.
list.Name: homeTerminalProvince

list.Description: Postal Code of physical location of the School Bus.
list.Name: homeTerminalPostalCode

list.Description: A comment about the physical location of the bus so that the Inspector can more easily find it for an inspection.
list.Name: homeTerminalComment

list.Description: Text of any restrictions to be printed on the school bus permit. Standard comments are associated with the Permit Class but the inspector can enter free form text.
list.Name: restrictionsText

list.Description: The next inspection date for this School Bus which is set when inspection results are saved
list.Name: nextInspectionDate

list.Description: Annual or Re-inspection based on the Pass/Fail status of the most recent inspection - An enumerated type (by the UI) to indicate the type of the next inspection
list.Name: nextInspectionTypeCode

list.Description: The School District in which the School Bus operates. The school bus may or may not be associated with the School District itself - we just track where it is regardless.
list.Name: schoolDistrict

list.Description: True if the School Bus is associated with an Independent School. If true,  the name of the Independent School should be in the companion field.
list.Name: isIndependentSchool

list.Description: The name of the Independent School to which the School Bus is associated. Should be null if the companion isIndependentSchool is false.
list.Name: independentSchoolName

list.Description: The enumerated class of School Bus from drop down
list.Name: permitClassCode

list.Description: The enumerated body type of the School Bus from drop down
list.Name: bodyTypeCode

list.Description: The unit number of the Bus as defined by the School Bus owner - freeform text.
list.Name: unitNumber

list.Description: The maximum number of passengers in the bus based on the specific use of the bus including the driver. For example,  the same 2-per seat / 24-passenger model might have a seating capacity of 36 if the specific bus is to be used for small children,  3 per seat.
list.Name: schoolBusSeatingCapacity

list.Description: The number of mobility aid passenger seats in the bus.
list.Name: mobilityAidCapacity

list.Description: The inspector assigned to this schoolbus
list.Name: inspector

list.Description: The set of notes about the school bus entered by users.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: The set of attachments about the school bus uploaded by the users.
list.Name: attachments

list.Description: The history of updates made to the School Bus.
list.Name: history

list.Description: CCWData for this School Bus
list.Name: CCWData

list.Description: Demographic information about companies, organizations, school districts, or individuals who own or lease school buses
list.Name: SchoolBusOwner

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a SchoolBusOwner
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the School Bus owner as defined by the user/Inspector. Not tied to the ICBC or NSC names,  but whatever is most useful for the Inspectors.
list.Name: name

list.Description: Status of the School Bus owner - enumerated value Active,  Inactive or Archived from drop down
list.Name: status

list.Description: The original create date and time of the owner record. The date-time of the creation of the record from the audit fields. Since this might be surfaced in the API,  adding it to the definition.
list.Name: dateCreated

list.Description: Link to the designated Primary Contact for the Inspector to the School Bus Owner organization.
list.Name: primaryContact

list.Description: The District to which this School Bus is affliated.
list.Name: District

list.Description: The set of contacts related to the School Bus Owner.
list.Name: contacts

list.Description: The set of notes about the school bus owner entered by users.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: The set of attachments about the school bus owner uploaded by the users.
list.Name: attachments

list.Description: The history of updates made to the School Bus Owner data.
list.Name: history

list.Description: Data pulled in from external sources (ICBC, NSC, etc) about School Buses and retained but not updated in the School Bus app. All data elements are simply copied from the comparable fields in the WSDLs of the Web Service Calls. The true source of the field definitions are in those other systems.
list.Name: CCWData

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for CCWData
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Registration Number (Regi) is the link between the CCW vehicle information and a specific School Bus
list.Name: ICBCRegistrationNumber

list.Description: Vehicle Year
list.Name: ICBCModelYear

list.Description: ICBC defined field - designates Commercial, Private, Other Categories
list.Name: ICBCVehicleType

list.Description: Defines usage such as pleasure only, business, delivery, etc..
list.Name: ICBCRateClass

list.Description: Six monthly commercial vehicle inspection decal number
list.Name: ICBCCVIPDecal

list.Description: The owner-defined number of the bus within their bus fleet.
list.Name: ICBCFleetUnitNo

list.Description: Vehicle gross weight in kgs
list.Name: ICBCGrossVehicleWeight

list.Description: Vehicle make
list.Name: ICBCMake

list.Description: Vehicle body code
list.Name: ICBCBody

list.Description: ICBC coded field about whether or not the vehicle has been rebuilt and if so the nature of the rebuilding.
list.Name: ICBCRebuiltStatus

list.Description: Expiry date of the last 6 month commercial vehicle inspection.
list.Name: ICBCCVIPExpiry

list.Description: Vehicle net weight in kgs
list.Name: ICBCNetWt

list.Description: Vehicle model codes used by ICBC - for example bus, scbus, dump, logtr
list.Name: ICBCModel

list.Description: Fuel type gasoline, propane, diesel etc..
list.Name: ICBCFuel

list.Description: Vehicle seating capacity including driver
list.Name: ICBCSeatingCapacity

list.Description: Vehicle color ex BLU, WHI, etc..
list.Name: ICBCColour

list.Description: Notes and orders from ICBC about the vehicle.
list.Name: ICBCNotesAndOrders

list.Description: TO BE DETERMINED
list.Name: ICBCOrderedOn

list.Description: The name of the registered owner of the vehicle - per ICBC.
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerName

list.Description: Owners address line 1
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerAddr1

list.Description: Owners address line 2
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerAddr2

list.Description: Owners address city
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerCity

list.Description: Owners address Province
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerProv

list.Description: Owners address Postal Code
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerPostalCode

list.Description: The status (as defined by ICBC) of the registered owner of the vehicle.
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerStatus

list.Description: Registered Owners Driver Licence number
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerRODL

list.Description: Previous Owners Driver Licence number
list.Name: ICBCRegOwnerPODL

list.Description: The License Plate Number for the vehicle
list.Name: ICBCLicencePlateNumber

list.Description: A code used by the automotive industry to uniquely identify individual motor vehicles. A vehicle identification number is frequently referred to using the acronym VIN and it is occasionally referred to as a chassis number.
list.Name: ICBCVehicleIdentificationNumber

list.Description: National Safety Code Carrier Number on ICBC client system
list.Name: NSCClientNum

list.Description: National Safety Code Carrier Name on ICBC client system
list.Name: NSCCarrierName

list.Description: Conditions imposed on the carrier (bus owner) within NSC
list.Name: NSCCarrierConditions

list.Description: Carrier safety rating ex - satisfatory, SAT-unaudited etc..
list.Name: NSCCarrierSafetyRating

list.Description: From NSC - The number of the carrier (NSC Clients) necessary insurance required to operate the vehicle.
list.Name: NSCPolicyNumber

list.Description: From NSC - The effective data of the policy.
list.Name: NSCPolicyEffectiveDate

list.Description: From NSC - The date the status of the policy was established.
list.Name: NSCPolicyStatusDate

list.Description: From NSC - The data of expiration of the policy.
list.Name: NSCPolicyExpiryDate

list.Description: From NSC - The latest status of the policy.
list.Name: NSCPolicyStatus

list.Description: From NSC - The plate decal as defined by NSC on the vehicle
list.Name: NSCPlateDecal

list.Description: School Bus inspection details supplementary to the RIP inspection
list.Name: Inspection

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for an Inspection
list.Name: id

list.Description: Defaults for a new inspection to the current user,  but can be changed as needed.
list.Name: inspector

list.Description: The date and time the inspection was conducted.
list.Name: inspectionDate

list.Description: The type of the inspection - enumerated type of Annual or Re-inspection,  pulled from the School Bus record at the time the inspection record is created
list.Name: inspectionTypeCode

list.Description: The result of the inspection - enumerated type of Passed or Failed. The detailed results of the inspection are in RIP and not duplicated here.
list.Name: inspectionResultCode

list.Description: A note about the inspection independent of what goes into the RIP inspection - this is just for the School Bus application.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: The ID of the RIP inspection. The expectation is that the user will manually enter a RIP ID such that an external URL can be formed to allow the user to open the RIP inspection and see the inspection details.
list.Name: RIPInspectionId

list.Description: Record creation date and time
list.Name: createdDate

list.Description: Notes entered by users about instance of entities - e.g. School Buses and School Bus Owners
list.Name: Note

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Note
list.Name: id

list.Description: The contents of the note.
list.Name: noteText

list.Description: A user set flag that the note is no longer relevant. Allows the note to be retained for historical reasons,  but identified to other users as no longer applicable.
list.Name: isNoLongerRelevant

list.Description: Attachments uploaded by users about instance of entities - e.g. School Buses and School Bus Owners
list.Name: Attachment

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for an Attachment
list.Name: id

list.Description: Filename as passed by the user uploading the file
list.Name: fileName

list.Description: Binary contents of the file
list.Name: fileContents

list.Description: A note about the attachment,  optionally maintained by the user.
list.Name: description

list.Description: Type of attachment
list.Name: type

list.Description: The history of updates made to an entity - e.g. a School Bus or a School Bus Owner
list.Name: History

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a History
list.Name: id

list.Description: The text of the history entry tracked against the related entity.
list.Name: historyText

list.Description: A table of contacts related to various entities in the system. FK fields are used to link contacts to records in the system.
list.Name: Contact

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Contact
list.Name: id

list.Description: The given name of the contact.
list.Name: givenName

list.Description: The surname of the contact.
list.Name: surname

list.Description: The organization name of the contact.
list.Name: organizationName

list.Description: The role of the contact. UI controlled as to whether it is free form or selected from an enumerated list - for initial implementation, the field is freeform.
list.Name: role

list.Description: A note about the contact maintained by the users.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: The email address for the contact.
list.Name: emailAddress

list.Description: The work phone number for the contact.
list.Name: workPhoneNumber

list.Description: The mobile phone number for the contact.
list.Name: mobilePhoneNumber

list.Description: The fax phone number for the contact.
list.Name: faxPhoneNumber

list.Description: Address 1 line of the address.
list.Name: address1

list.Description: Address 2 line of the address.
list.Name: address2

list.Description: The City of the address.
list.Name: city

list.Description: The Province of the address.
list.Name: province

list.Description: The postal code of the address.
list.Name: postalCode

list.Description: User specific settings for a specific location in the UI. The location and saved settings are internally defined by the UI.
list.Name: UserFavourite

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a UserFavourite
list.Name: id

list.Description: The type of Favourite
list.Name: type

list.Description: The user-defined name for the recorded settings. Allows the user to save different groups of settings and access each one easily when needed.
list.Name: name

list.Description: The settings saved by the user. In general,  a UI defined chunk of json that stores the settings in place when the user created the favourite.
list.Name: value

list.Description: True if this Favourite is the default for this Context Type. On first access to a context in a session the default favourite for the context it is invoked. If there is no default favourite,  a system-wide default is invoked. On return to the context within a session,  the last parameters used are reapplied.
list.Name: isDefault

list.Description: The User who has this Favourite
list.Name: User

list.Description: The MOTI-defined Regions - must match the official MOTI List
list.Name: Region

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Region
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Ministry ID for the Region
list.Name: ministryRegionID

list.Description: The name of the Region
list.Name: name

list.Description: The effective date of the Region record - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The end date of the Region record; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: The MOTI-defined Districts - must match the official MOTI List
list.Name: District

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a District
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Ministry ID for the District
list.Name: ministryDistrictID

list.Description: The name of the District
list.Name: name

list.Description: The region in which the District is found.
list.Name: region

list.Description: The effective date of the District record - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The end date of the District record; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: The MOTI-defined Service Areas - must match the official MOTI List
list.Name: ServiceArea

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a ServiceArea
list.Name: id

list.Description: The Ministry ID for the Service Area
list.Name: ministryServiceAreaID

list.Description: The name of the Service Area
list.Name: name

list.Description: The district in which the Service Area is found.
list.Name: district

list.Description: The effective date of the Service Area record - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: startDate

list.Description: The end date of the Service Area record; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: endDate

list.Description: A list of School Districts in the Province of BC. Authoritative source to be determined.
list.Name: SchoolDistrict

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a SchoolDistrict
list.Name: id

list.Description: The full name of the School District
list.Name: name

list.Description: A short name for the School District useful in some areas of the UI. Usually with format \"SD 61\".
list.Name: shortName

list.Description: A list of cities in BC. Authoritative source to be determined.
list.Name: City

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a City
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the City
list.Name: name

list.Description: The name of the province of the city
list.Name: province

list.Description: The contents of the Jurisdiction table from CCW so that the user can select a Jurisdiction for passing to CCW on certain Out of Province School Bus Web Service calls
list.Name: CCWJurisdiction

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a CCWJurisdiction
list.Name: id

list.Description: The CCW system-generated unique identifier for a CCWJurisdiction. Needed for updating the table from CCW if necessary.
list.Name: jurisdictionId

list.Description: The effective date of the CCWJurisdiction record - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: effectiveDate

list.Description: The end date of the CCWJurisdiction record; null if active - NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: expiryDate

list.Description: Flag from CCW indicating if the record is still active - Y indicating it is active. NOT CURRENTLY ENFORCED IN SCHOOL BUS
list.Name: activeFlag

list.Description: A short version of the Jurisdiction - the familiar two-letter province or state code
list.Name: code

list.Description: The full version of the Jurisdiction name.
list.Name: description

list.Description: Users associated with specific notifications, created at the time the notification record is created because of the user's business relationship to the bus - e.g. the user is the currently assigned inspector, or the user is the manager for the District in which the bus is located. The rules for linking a user to a notification for a specific bus could vary over time based on the needs of the business. At minimum, it is expected the current inspector assigned to a bus will be notified of every notification for that bus.
list.Name: Notification

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Notification
list.Name: id

list.Description: True if the user linked to the inspection has read the notification
list.Name: hasBeenViewed

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED
list.Name: isWatchNotification

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED
list.Name: isExpired

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED
list.Name: isAllDay

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED
list.Name: priorityCode

list.Description: Notifications associated about changes (mostly from CCW data) to information related to a specific school bus - e.g. change of owner at ICBC, change in NSC client rating, etc.
list.Name: NotificationEvent

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a NotificationEvent
list.Name: id

list.Description: The date/time of the creation of the event that triggered the creation of the notification.
list.Name: eventTime

list.Description: A categorization of the event for which the notification was created. The categories will be defined over time in code based on the requirements of the business. An example might be "ICBCOwnerNameChange" for when a change in the CCWData ICBC Owner Name field is changed.
list.Name: eventTypeCode

list.Description: A further categorization of the event for which the notification was created.
list.Name: eventSubTypeCode

list.Description: An assembled text string about the event that triggered the notification. Includes both static text and data about the notification. User Interface code will be used (based on the eventTypeCode - category) to assemble a dynamic string of information about the event - potentially including links to other relevant data - such as link to the School Bus detail screen.
list.Name: notes

list.Description: TO BE REMOVED
list.Name: notificationGenerated

list.Description: Information about the users of the system.
list.Name: User

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a User
list.Name: id

list.Description: Given name of the user.
list.Name: givenName

list.Description: Surname of the user.
list.Name: surname

list.Description: Initials of the user, to be presented where screen space is at a premium.
list.Name: initials

list.Description: The email address of the user in the system.
list.Name: email

list.Description: A flag indicating the User is active in the system. Set false to remove access to the system for the user.
list.Name: active

list.Description: Security Manager User ID
list.Name: smUserId

list.Description: The GUID unique to the user as provided by the authentication system. In this case, authentication is done by Siteminder and the GUID uniquely identifies the user within the user directories managed by Siteminder - e.g. IDIR and BCeID. The GUID is equivalent to the IDIR Id, but is guaranteed unique to a person, while the IDIR ID is not - IDIR IDs can be recycled.
list.Name: guid

list.Description: The user directory service used by Siteminder to authenticate the user - usually IDIR or BCeID.
list.Name: smAuthorizationDirectory

list.Description: The District that the User belongs to
list.Name: district

list.Description: A join table that provides allows each user to have any number of Roles in the system.  At login time the user is given the sum of the permissions of the roles assigned to that user.
list.Name: UserRole

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a UserRole
list.Name: id

list.Description: The date on which the user was given the related role.
list.Name: effectiveDate

list.Description: The date on which a role previously assigned to a user was removed from that user.
list.Name: expiryDate

list.Description: A table managed in the application by authorized users to create named Roles that can be assigned to Users as needed. Roles can be created as needed to support the users of the system and the roles they perform within the organization.
list.Name: Role

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Role
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the Role, as established by the user creating the role.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A description of the role as set by the user creating/updating the role.
list.Name: description

list.Description: The collection of permissions included in a role.
list.Name: RolePermission

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a RolePermission
list.Name: id

list.Description: The set of permissions defined in the application. Each permission is given a name and triggers some behavior defined in the application. For example, a permission might allow users to see data or to have access to functionality restricted to users without that permission. Permissions are created as needed to the application and are added to the permissions table by data migrations executed at the time the software that uses the permission is deployed.
list.Name: Permission

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Permission
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the permission referenced in the software of the application.
list.Name: code

list.Description: The 'user friendly' name of the permission exposed to the user selecting the permissions to be included in a Role.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A description of the purpose of the permission and exposed to the user selecting the permissions to be included in a Role.
list.Name: description

list.Description: The users associated with a given group that has been defined in the application.
list.Name: GroupMembership

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a GroupMembership
list.Name: id

list.Description: A flag indicating the User is active in the group. Set false to remove the user from the designated group.
list.Name: active

list.Description: A named entity that is used to created a collection of users into a group. For example, the School Bus Inspectors are in the group Inspectors. Groups, like permissions are defined by the application and referenced in the code of the application.
list.Name: Group

list.Description: A system-generated unique identifier for a Group
list.Name: id

list.Description: The name of the group, as refenced in the code.
list.Name: name

list.Description: A description of the group that is presented to the user when they are setting a user into a group.
list.Name: description
